inclusion.criterion: At least on measurable disease according to the Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed invasive breast cancer, tumor size ≥2 cm, T2-4 N0-3M0
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ER/PR/HER-2 and Ki-67 status detected on core biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No prior systemic or loco-regional treatment of breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate bone marrow function: WBC≥4.0×10^9/L, Absolute neutrophil count（ANC）≥1.5×10^9/L, Platelets（PLT）≥100×10^9/L, Hemoglobin（Hb）≥90g/L; aspartate aminotransferase(AST), Alanine aminotransferase (ALT)≤1.5 upper normal limit (UNL), creatinine≤1.5 UNL, bilirubin≤1.5UNL
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling or unable to use an acceptable method of contraception in 8 weeks (including 8 weeks) after final dose of test drug
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient is pregnant or breast feeding
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inflammatory breast cancer and metastatic breast cancer
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a history of cytologically confirmed breast cancer, with a tumor size of 3 cm. She is HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.
